mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_question (md_id, member_id, member_nick, md_question_title, md_question_content, md_question_date, md_question_type) VALUES(#{md_id}, #{member_id}, #{member_nick}, #{md_question_title}, #{md_question_content}, now(), #{md_question_type})
mapper.select: select md_question_id, md_id, member_id, member_nick, md_question_title, md_question_content , md_question_date, md_question_answer, md_question_type, md_answer_id, md_answer_member , md_answer_content, md_answer_date from md_question where md_id = #{md_id} order by md_question_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10
select count(md_question_id) cnt from md_question where md_id = #{md_id}
